name: Coming Late
description:
This semi-satirical horror game was made within several days in December 2022 for the Secret Santa game jam. 

Since time ran out, I had to cut several ideas and there is plenty of glitches and jankiness involved. If you still want to play it, here are a few hints I couldn't get into the game:

- There wasn't enough time for controller support, so mostly keyboard only 
- Objects can be dropped with F
- The phone can controlled with the arrow keys (l/r for switching apps, up/down for scrolling)

Have fun :)
